name: 施議訓
objective:
本課程講述瞭解國際標準驗證之觀念。本課程之目的在使學生能建國際標準驗證基本知識及稽核驗證之技巧，可進一步將所學之國際標準驗證與實際運作加以結合，並配合國際標準驗證第三者驗證機構考試獲得內部稽核員之證書，對未來投入職場助益頗大。
國際標準驗證目前有一般通用的，如ISO9001、ISO14001、OHSAS18001等各種類型；另外專業方面如資安為ISO27001，食品安全為ISO22000等。
本課程上學期教授國際標準驗證ISO9001上完課程獲得學分外並可參加第三者驗證機構考試獲得內部稽核員之證書。
英文課程概述：
This course covers knowledge of international standards verification of the concept. The purpose of this course to enable students to build basic knowledge of international standards for verification and audit verification of the technique can be further verified by the study of international standards to be combined with the actual operation, and in line with international standards verification test to obtain third party certification agency internal auditors of the certificate, and entered the workplace of the future benefit considerably.
There are international standards for general validation, such as ISO9001, ISO14001, OHSAS18001 and other types; other professional areas such as information security as ISO27001, ISO22000 and other food safety.
Teach this course last semester to complete ISO9001 international standard certification courses to obtain credit and participate in external examination to obtain third party certification agency internal auditors of the certificate.
